transcript.text: Finally time has come !
I can finally talk about that !
My friends today i will talk about the biggest project of my history
not about my youtube channel because its not a video project
but about my career
"ho this guy is talking about his career, he's showing off !"
First of all it's not only my project, there is a lot of people who worked on it
but the idea came out in July 2014.
When after having done several lives of CyprienGaming [another YT channel] Cyprien tells me :
"And what if we create a TV Web with all of the people we like ?"
"Yeah, why not !" "Great, well you take care of it ! Goodbye !"
Well you may maybe .. oh the Romanian !"
No it's not, sorry it's false he found the name
and for this he worked really hard
*Music*
The stream !
Thanks Cyprien for your participation on this project !
No, just kidding, I'm caricaturin, he actually really helped us
I'm doing too much, but yeah, I wanted to joke, ok ?
Well, The Stream, what is it ?
Do you know Twitch, or live in Internet in general ?
You may already know Zerator, Skyyart, Jiraya, Domingo
Alphacast, Gotaga, and there are still others
*Whole bunch of other french streamers*
*Explosion*
These are streamers, people who play live videogames on Internet
And when streamers gather together
to propose different programs to different time slots
it forms a TV Web !
And thestream.fr, what is it ?
It's a TV Web.
It dates back very very far away
But we really had the desire of doing a project
with all of the poeple we like, we've been led to meet
or even work with for some of them
We thought : "Damn, these guys are so cool
we love what they do, they are really nice, we must work all together even more
that we create things more together with a good atmosphere
not especially on videogames, but
yeah, we had this desire of doings something with
And on YT, well I want to make videos where i'm sometimes with people
but also often when I'm alone
So we had to make something more
And it's there you're happy because it does more content for you
You're not happy, it's because  the launch has failed
Thus we contact all of these people we like
Near or far
And propose them the project, to tell them :
"Guys, come and let's make a TV Web together
this would be great !"
Well we had to developp more, or else they would have said "No"
And we were really enthusiastic because
These people accepted
but it was two years ago.
The website took enormously time to be done
so that means : let's talk about the website
What can you find on it ?
Well as I said there's TV Web, the main channel of the website
It's from midday to about 2AM everyday
It starts at midday and finishes during the night and everyday it takes up again
And depending on the hours, there are a lot of different programs presented by different persons
For example, from twelve o'clock to 2 PM, it can be someone playing videogames, and from 2 PM to 4 PM it can be several people playing to a board game
There is everything, video games, IRL videos, talk show, sport videos, etc. There will be everything in this Web TV.
Because we wanted to have a diversity of programs that everyone can watch. Even people that doesn't like watching someone playing video games for hours [Even tho i like it]
In addition to this Web TV, that starts at 12 o'clock and end during the night, then starts again at 12 o'clock and end during night... *laugh* i'm unbearable
You'll find the whole team in their own section in the website
For example, imagine i've finished my stream from 12 o'clock to 2 PM on monday, you'll still be able to follow my personal stream on the website if i still want to stream
All the tabs are linked to Twitch, these are Twitch channels
But you better use on the website for all it's cool functionalities that we developped with Mickalow (aka the bastard that beats me on every single game we play for 5 years now)
I really hope that you'll enjoy all these functionalities. But trust me, you better use the Website instead of going on Twitch. (and it's more beautiful than Twitch)
We didn't spend 2 years for nothing !
And actually, you've maybe already clicked on the link, and you're probably disappointed because of the countdown. The website isn't already opened
It opens Wednesday at 5 PM, one hour before the very first program of the website: The Prime !
Yeah I know, LeStream [TheStream], Le Prime [The Prime], that's not really original i gotta admit.
So, what's The Prime ? It's a show that will last for 1h30, 2h every Wednesday in the beginning of the evening
Primes are normally at 8 PM, but we moved this one forward to 6 PM because there is the PSG vs Barcelona football match, and we all know that everyone will watch it
So, The Prime is a show in which the entire team will be there. Two teams will fight through a lot of events
Ok, it's time to reveal the team (and i thank them a lot for accepting): Maxildan, Mickalow, Gotaga, Xari, Jiraya (10E), CoDJordan, Cyprien, Skyyart, Nameless, Zank, Manami, Zoulou and Trinity
*awkward applause*
Don't miss it: Wednesday at 5 PM
We've prepared a lot of cool stuff for you !
And don't forget to follow the Twitch channel and the Twitter account of TheStream [LeStream], links in the description
I hope you'll discover the website by yourself, watching the daily programs, etc
Take care of yourself, *LeStream.fr* !
